review: I had purchase the Fire TV to replace the WII that I was using to watch movies in my living room.  In my bedroom I have the Google Chromecast. With 1 weekend of watching my Hulu, Netflix, and now Prime Videos the entire weekend.  I decided to move the Amazon Fire TV in my bedroom and have never looked back.  I have moved the Google Chromecast in the living room and love the Amazon Fire TV device.  Love that I can use my Prime Membership for other then great shipping rates and quick delivery.  Really love my weekends now........Thanks Amazon
author: Amazon Customer

review: I purchased my Amazon Fire TV on July 17. I have a 40" LED TV. The quality of the movies and videos is incredible. I have a sophisticated stereo component system but let me tell you it is amazing the Quality of the sound that comes through this Fire TV onto my TV.Today I fianlly learned how to stream the music videos I want to see from Youtube. Youtube has so much good stuff.  I received from Amazon a 30 day trial for Prime and it is worth getting the yearly subscription which I intend to get when my 30 day trial ends. Prime offers a lot of good movies and series plus you get free shipping if purchased from Amazon.
